channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Peruvian farmer goes head to head with German energy giant in climate test case
item.description: A Peruvian farmer is going head to head with German energy giant in a climate law test case.

item.title: 'I had one child and I lost him' - North Macedonia mourns nightclub disaster
item.description: Fifty-nine people have been killed following a fire at a nightclub in North Macedonia.

item.title: Fresh US strikes in Yemen with 53 now dead, Houthis say
item.description: The US said it launched a "decisive and powerful" wave of air strikes on Houthi targets on Saturday.

item.title: Saakashvili handed further four years in jail
item.description: The former president of Georgia has been imprisoned since 2021 when he returned to the country.

item.title: Why do we celebrate St. Patrick's Day?
item.description: As revelers celebrate St. Patrick's Day in 2025, here's a look at who Ireland's patron saint was and the meaning behind the holiday.

item.title: Man found alive after 94 days stranded at sea eating turtles, birds
item.description: Maximo Napa was rescued in his small fishing boat after being spotted by an Ecuadoran vessel off the coast of northern Peru.

item.title: Wholesale egg prices are going down. How soon will it affect your grocery bill?
item.description: Economists say the sharp decline in wholesale egg prices is a positive sign, with some anticipating lower prices at grocery stores in a few weeks.
